name: SidelineSwap, Inc.
description: Operator of an online sports gear marketplace intended to allow athletes to indulge in trading sports equipment. The company's marketplace connects athletes to facilitate the process of buying and selling sports goods and gear, enabling athletes to save costs involved in purchasing the sports gear outright.
one_liner: Operator of an online sports gear marketplace intended to allow athletes to indulge in trading sports equipment. The company's marketplace connects athletes to facilitate the process of buying and selling sports goods and gear, enabling athletes to save costs involved in purchasing the sports gear outright.
